Name: distribution network construction, electricity, low voltage | distribution network, electricity, low voltage | EN15804GD, U
Category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects
Description: Average of low voltage underground cables (115'926 km) and aerial lines (12'720 km) in Switzerland in 2010 (Itten et al.2010). Switching stations use SF6.;The lifetime of the network is assumed to be 30 years (lifetime of most individual components assumed 40 years).
